extendedInfo.description: Train your dog to do tricks!Train your dog to stop barking!or if there is a dog next door, use this app to make it silent.Features-Variable frequency tone generator-Bark detector-Sound level meterHow does it work?Dogs are capable of hearing sounds at much higher frequencies than people. A dog whistle works by emitting a high frequency tone in a range that a dog does not ordinarily encounter â typically between 14,000 Hz and 20,000 Hz. The highest frequency a normal middle aged human can hear is 12,000-14,000 Hz, so donât be alarmed if you canât hear the dog whistle yourself. These high frequency tones have the effect of immediately getting a dogâs attention. Dog whistles are typically used as part of a training routine designed to train your dog to do tricks or for behavior modification. A pure tone is much easier for a dog to distinguish compared to verbal commands. Different sound patterns can be used to trigger different responses. For example, two short bursts could mean stop and one long burst could mean lie down. The bark detector feature of this application triggers a tone when the sound level exceeds a threshold. This feature, in addition to training, can be used to help you train your dog to stop barking. Dog whistles are great training tools and has been used successfully with all breeds.

reviews.title: This sucks man
reviews.comment: When i went to bye snacks at the store walking i saw some dogs and they started to bark and so i did the \"dog whistle\" and they just kep barking i did this with like 5 dif dogs and nothing happened.

reviews.title: Privacy has gone to the dogs
reviews.comment: Requires:  Network communication full network access view network connections Phone calls read phone status and identity Your applications information run at startup  The hell it does.  Uninstalled.

reviews.title: Dog Hater!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: So happy that it saved my life from a pit bull that tried to kill me 2 day !!! I didn\'t even have to punch it in the face..big life saver!! My life depends on this app everyday since I hate dogs!!! All I need is one for Cats cause I hate Cats as well!!!

reviews.title: Amazing freebie!

reviews.title: I know a way to shut people up >XD
reviews.comment: I haven\'t tried this on a dog yet, but my friends and I tried it in a room full of people and EVERYONE got quiet. I did think it would be a silent one only dogs could hear. But if I know it works on annoying people, dogs better beware

reviews.title: Khz not accurate
reviews.comment: This does NOT work. Probably because this app only goes up to 19 khz when dog whistles are supposed to be between 23 and 54 khz. Sometimes my dog (mini dachshund) is in a different part of the yard while I\'m in the house and I want to be able to use this if he starts barking but with a range of only 7 khz-19khz how would that work, especially with distance involved? Doesn\'t even work in the house.
reviews.author: Helbe Zen
